issue.title: Add an option to pass an existing figure to get_grid
issue.body:
In case you decide that passing a figure in is ok (#54), here is an implementation :)
Thank you for this project!

issue.title: Allow user to insert existing figure into specific grid
issue.body: Can we add an insert function to let users insert their premade figures into specific grids?

rename.from: Fix RectangularStrategy() results if get_grid() parameter is prime
rename.to: Fix RectangularStrategy() results if get_grid() argument is prime

issue.title: Fix RectangularStrategy() results if get_grid() argument is prime
issue.body: RectangularStrategy, if get_grid takes in prime N, creates a one-row by N cols plots grid.  This poses an issue with larger prime numbers (N > 3)

issue.title: Fix RectangularStrategy() results if get_grid() argument is prime

issue.title: Fix RectangularStrategy() results if get_grid() argument is prime
issue.body: RectangularStrategy, if get_grid takes in prime N, creates a one-row by N cols plots grid.  This poses an issue with larger prime numbers (N > 3)

issue.title: Add tests
issue.body: We should have `tests/test_strategies.py`, using `pytest` with parametrized tests.

issue.title: Add tests for stripe_even
issue.body:
The existing strategies can't ever use stripe_even in these cases, but stripe_even is public, so I am adding tests for it directly, even though I am not terribly comfortable guaranteeing this behavior.

I am mainly doing this because the lure of 100% test coverage is too strong to resist.

issue.title: Improve coverage
issue.body:
The biggest problem with the coverage was that we could not test `GridSpec` objects, so I have created a small mock that allows us to ensure the right grid specs are created.

This brings the code coverage up to 98%. The only remaining untested lines are never hit by the "main" functions, and I am somewhat reluctant to directly test `stripe_even` and `stripe_odd`, because I'm not entirely sure why I made them public.

issue.title: Prepare for distribution builds
issue.body:
Tweaks to ensure that the metadata will work correctly when preparing builds for PyPI.

Also adds some additional tox environments and testing for the builds.

issue.title: Fill out __init__.py
issue.body:
We should make `GridStrategy` public.

We should also add a docstring and an `__all__ = ['GridStrategy']` attribute as well.

issue.title: Configure code coverage
issue.body: Once we have `tox` and `CI` set up, we would also like to start checking the code coverage automatically. See the [repos to steal from](https://github.com/matplotlib/grid-strategy/wiki#repos-to-steal-from-learn-from), `dateutil` and `setuptools` both have code coverage configured through `tox`.

issue.title: Added a new alignment called 'justified' that makes the whole figure …
issue.body: …have the same width. Can be passed into the call to the strategy type just like the previous alignments.
